answers.answer: Hi there. Paraesthesia or tingling is caused by nerve damage or disease.  The causes are nerve injury like pinched nerves which can get permanent with delayed treatment, anxiety or panic attack, tumor around the spinal cord ,multiple sclerosis, diabetes, alcohol or tobacco, circulatory disorders like high blood pressure or due to smoking etc. Certain investigations would be requires like MRI spine, blood tests, cerebrospinal fluid examination etc. certain vitamin deficiencies like B12 also need to be ruled out and supplemented if deficient. Take care.

question: since 3 days ago i started having tingling in my body most especially my arm and feet. pls what could this be?
title: tingling in my body
